profile.name:
Xingyu Chen 
(陳星宇)
profile.tagline: My interests include astrochemistry and astrophysics crossing with AI.

education.text: M.Sc. (Earth and Planetary Sciences), State Key Laboratory of Lunar and Planetary Sciences, Macau University of Science and Technology (2025–present) · Supervised by Prof. Yunzhao Wu
B.S. (Geographic Information Science), Jilin University (2021–2025) · Supervised by Prof. Yongzhi Wang

work.text: Research Assistant — RS&GIS Lab in Jilin University (2023-present)

memos.note: Looking for a short time visiting or a summer school with full fundings. I'm now both in Space Science Institute of M.U.S.T. and Planetary Spectroscopy Group of Purple Mountain Observatory (Supervised by Prof. Yunzhao Wu)

publications.title: ResGAT-F: a novel graph neural network-based approach for evaluating landing suitability in the lunar southern polar region
publications.authors: Shibo Wen, Yongzhi Wang, Xingyu Chen et al.

publications.title: Graph attention network-based mineral prospectivity prediction: A case study of copper exploration in eastern Tien Shan, China
publications.authors: Shiting Sheng, Yongzhi Wang, Jiangtao Tian, Xingyu Chen et al.

publications.title: Construction technology of super-agents for intelligent mineral resources prediction driven by large model (Chinese)
publications.authors: Yongzhi Wang, Shibo Wen, Bowen Li, Xingyu Chen et al.

Lunar Rille Auto-Detection System Based on Deep-Learning Semantic Segmentation (Copyright No. 2025SR0857259, China)
Lunar Landing Site Assessment System Based on Self-Organizing Map (SOM) (Copyright No. 2025SR0859061, China)
